reviewText: Just like I remember it from my childhood. My two year old can't get enough Mr. Rogers! She fell in love with it the first time she saw it!
Our grandchildren, ages 3 and 5 love this DVD!  It's a good change from the many loud and action packed DVDs.

Mr. Rogers never disappoints.  My 3 year old grandson loves him and all the neighbors on his show.  We have purchased several of these DVDs and I think he will be watching them for years to come.  What great lessons he teaches.
I like the slow pace of Mr. Roger's and the positive moral values. I think children of every generation should know how to watch simple television that teaches good messages. This video does that.
The last episodes freezes at the end.  Otherwise I am pleased with it. Glad I can purchase Mr. Rogers videos

We loved the values-centered teaching of this series for our children when they were babies. We wanted to share them with our grand daughter. But we have since discovered Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood which is faster paced for the more modern age and covers many of the same lessons as Mr. Rogers. We watch it with our grand daughter and she likes it but it is slower in pace than the new series. Also it does not contain some of our favorite episodes from the show.
My brother, who is disabled didn't leave the dvd out of his hands once he got it unwrapped. Fred will live on in our hearts forever.

Timeless goodness in the Mister Rogers dvds.  I am so glad we can still find them.
His work continues to help children and parents.

We have been buying Mr. Rogers videos since the triplets were 18 months old.  They loved them - instantly -- and still like to watch them.  They learned about etiquette, friendship and music from these videos.  Mr. Rogers is very appropriate for children today.  I believe all children can benefit from his shows.  Try them!!!
He is truly missed. Now kids shows consist of flatulence, yelling, nose picking, over loading your senses with neon colors, belching, and hitting. Maybe I'm getting old, but I miss Mr. Rogers style.

I love Mister Rogers Neighborhood and was really excited to share the shows with my kids. While the video is just fine the audio is quite awful. The first disk skips frequently and the second has a high pitch frequency ringing through it.
A good gift fot a friends son
If we all moved into Mr  Rogers neighborhood, the world might work. Classic, calming, teaching videos great for close time with the wee ones.
One can't go wrong with Fred Rogers.
My daughter loves watching Mr Rogers.  I only wish that more of his television show was available on DVD.
Brought back so many great memories!
